languages.text: "Ну и местечко... Навевает воспоминания о моем первом карательном рейде. Чистый был штурм, только хибары еще долго горели".
languages.translation_comment: Visiting the Shadow Quarters on Footfall.

traits.locale_text: "Ну и местечко... Навевает воспоминания о моем первом карательном рейде. Чистый был штурм, только хибары еще долго горели".

languages.text: "What a gem of a place. It reminds me of my first punitive raid. A clean assault, except the hovels took a while to burn down."
languages.translation_comment: Visiting the Shadow Quarters on Footfall.
languages.original_text: "Ну и местечко... Навевает воспоминания о моем первом карательном рейде. Чистый был штурм, только хибары еще долго горели".

traits.locale_text: "What a gem of a place. It reminds me of my first punitive raid. A clean assault, except the hovels took a while to burn down."
"What a gem of a place. It reminds me of my first punitive raid. A clean assault, except the hovels took a while to burn down."
"What a gem of a place. It reminds me of my first punitive raid. A clean assault, except the hovels took a while to burn down."
"What a gem of a place. It reminds me of my first punitive raid. A clean assault, except the hovels took a while to burn down."
"What a gem of a place. It reminds me of my first punitive raid. A clean assault, except the hovels took a while to burn down."
"What a gem of a place. It reminds me of my first punitive raid. A clean assault, except the hovels took a while to burn down."

languages.text: 「なんて素晴らしい場所だ。まるで最初の懲罰的襲撃を思い出す。手際のいい攻撃だった。あの掘っ建て小屋が燃え尽きるまで、少しかかったことを除けばだが」
languages.original_text: "What a gem of a place. It reminds me of my first punitive raid. A clean assault, except the hovels took a while to burn down."

traits.locale_text: 「なんて素晴らしい場所だ。まるで最初の懲罰的襲撃を思い出す。手際のいい攻撃だった。あの掘っ建て小屋が燃え尽きるまで、少しかかったことを除けばだが」

languages.text: "Wunderbar ist das hier. Es erinnert mich an meine erste Strafrazzia. Ein sauberer Angriff, nur hat es eine ganze Weile gedauert, bis die Baracken niedergebrannt waren."
languages.original_text: "What a gem of a place. It reminds me of my first punitive raid. A clean assault, except the hovels took a while to burn down."

traits.locale_text: "Wunderbar ist das hier. Es erinnert mich an meine erste Strafrazzia. Ein sauberer Angriff, nur hat es eine ganze Weile gedauert, bis die Baracken niedergebrannt waren."

languages.text: « Voilà un endroit remarquable. Il me rappelle mon premier raid punitif. Un assaut très propre, sauf qu'il nous a fallu un certain temps pour brûler les taudis. »
languages.original_text: "What a gem of a place. It reminds me of my first punitive raid. A clean assault, except the hovels took a while to burn down."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà un endroit remarquable. Il me rappelle mon premier raid punitif. Un assaut très propre, sauf qu'il nous a fallu un certain temps pour brûler les taudis. »

languages.text: «Este sitio es una joya. Me recuerda a mi primera incursión de castigo. Fue un asalto limpio, aunque las chozas tardaron un rato largo en arder».
languages.original_text: "What a gem of a place. It reminds me of my first punitive raid. A clean assault, except the hovels took a while to burn down."

traits.locale_text: «Este sitio es una joya. Me recuerda a mi primera incursión de castigo. Fue un asalto limpio, aunque las chozas tardaron un rato largo en arder».

languages.text: “这里真是个漂亮的地方，不禁让我想起了第一次惩戒袭击的经历。那场袭击干净利落，只是那些小棚子烧了一阵子才彻底烧光。”
languages.original_text: "What a gem of a place. It reminds me of my first punitive raid. A clean assault, except the hovels took a while to burn down."

traits.locale_text: “这里真是个漂亮的地方，不禁让我想起了第一次惩戒袭击的经历。那场袭击干净利落，只是那些小棚子烧了一阵子才彻底烧光。”

languages.text: "Burası tam bir cevher. İlk cezai baskınımı hatırladım. Temiz bir işti, barakaları yakmak epey zamanımızı almıştı tabii."
languages.original_text: "What a gem of a place. It reminds me of my first punitive raid. A clean assault, except the hovels took a while to burn down."

traits.locale_text: "Burası tam bir cevher. İlk cezai baskınımı hatırladım. Temiz bir işti, yalnız barakaları yakmak epey zamanımızı almıştı."

languages.original_text: "What a gem of a place. It reminds me of my first punitive raid. A clean assault, except the hovels took a while to burn down."
